text:
Despite having two types of #cancer scans today, I've had a decent day!

I'm thrilled people like me are starting to get a #COVID19 #vaccine 😃

I spent my scans daydreaming I was in Norfolk! 😍

And at the @royalmarsdenNHS I made a new friend from the @royalmarsden charity! 😍 https://t.co/mI8ZpwZDCw
